channel.title: How do you un ipban someone from your server and how do you change stat bonuses
channel.description:
Just wondering
some hacked ipbanned my friend and bandos and stuff has too high of bonuses. >>

item.title: How do you un ipban someone from your server and how do you change stat bonuses
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

to un ipban some1 go into data ad click bannedips and delete the ip save it.
and when urusing item.cg make sur u use notepad to open it

item.title: How do you un ipban someone from your server and how do you change stat bonuses
item.dc:creator: @darkdude551 darkdude551
item.description:
@darkdude551 wrote:

To unipban some1 go to your source folder and open the data folder and there should be a .txt documant saying bannedips open it and delete his ip from the list then save it

Read full topic
item.source: How do you un ipban someone from your server and how do you change stat bonuses

item.title: How do you un ipban someone from your server and how do you change stat bonuses
item.dc:creator: @ginger_ninja ginger_ninja
item.description:
@ginger_ninja wrote:

look in item.cfg in your source ctr+f and look for item = 15334 Bandos_Godsword The_Bandos_God_Used_This 65000000 65000000 65000000 3 4 13 14 12 12 12 16 12 6 120 11 9 1 change the 3,4,13 etc to chagen stat bonus’[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2008, 10:50:40 PM[/size][hr]your item id may be different so search for bandos…

Read full topic
